content:
{"name": "Morrow County Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "You can submit your application in the following ways:
Online through the ODJFS Online Benefit Application Portal. Select “Apply for Benefits”. After completing the application, continue with steps 2 through 4.
Print an application (Link located in application forms) and return through:
Fax your signed application to 419-947-9115.
Deliver in person
Signed applications can be delivered at MCJFS’s main location:
619 West Marion Rd., Entrance B, Lower Level, Mt. Gilead, Ohio 43338", "email": "", "url": null, "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "619 West Marion Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Mount Gilead", "state_province": "OH", "postal_code": "43338", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.547968, "longitude": -82.8491276}, "phones": [{"number": "(844) 640-6446", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "13:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of household income required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Appointments required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "A photo ID is required"}]}
